sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Button, Container, Typography, Stack, Grid, Paper } from '@mui/material';
import { blue, red, grey } from '@mui/material/colors';

const Home = () => {
  return (
    <Container maxWidth="lg" sx={{ padding: 4 }}>
      <Paper sx={{ backgroundColor: blue[800], padding: 6, borderRadius: 2, color: '#fff' }}>
        <Typography variant="h1" align="center" gutterBottom sx={{ color: '#fff', textShadow: '2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)' }}>
          Welcome to SportsZone
        </Typography>
        <Typography variant="h6" align="center" paragraph sx={{ color: '#fff', textShadow: '1px 1px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)' }}>
          Your one-stop solution for managing sports tournaments.
        </Typography>
      </Paper>

      <Stack spacing={4} alignItems="center" sx={{ marginTop: 4 }}>
        <Grid container spacing={4} justifyContent="center">
          <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
            <Paper elevation={3} sx={{ padding: 4, textAlign: 'center' }}>
              <Typography variant="h4" gutterBottom>
                For Participants
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body1" paragraph>
                Access features and manage your participation with ease. Explore our portal to find everything you need for a great sports experience.
              </Typography>
              <Button variant="contained" color="primary" size="large" sx={{ mt: 2 }}>
                Participant Portal
              </Button>
            </Paper>
          </Grid>

          <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
            <Paper elevation={3} sx={{ padding: 4, textAlign: 'center' }}>
              <Typography variant="h4" gutterBottom>
                For Organizers
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body1" paragraph>
                Manage tournaments, oversee events, and ensure everything runs smoothly. Our organizer portal provides all the tools you need.
              </Typography>
              <Button variant="contained" color="secondary" size="large" sx={{ mt: 2 }}>
                Organizer Portal
              </Button>
            </Paper>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
      </Stack>
    </Container>
  );
};

export default Home;
